The king's request: or, Dauid's desire A sermon preached at the last generall fast holden at Yorke, the 21. of Aprill last. By Phinees Hodson Doctour of Diuinity, and Chancellour of the Metropoliticall Church of St. Peter-Yorke. Hodson, Phineas, d. 1646.
[2], 34 p.
Printed by Tho. Harper, for Edward Blount, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1628.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
